abstract: Denzel Washington endows professorship at Fordham University
snippet: Denzel Washington endows professorship at Fordham University
lead_paragraph: Denzel Washington has donated $2 million to his alma mater, Fordham University, to endow its first professorship in theater with the goal of attracting a well-known actor, director, playwright, designer or other artist to rotate into the position at the school's Lincoln Center theater program each fall, university officials announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: Denzel Washington Endows a Theater Professorship at Fordham
